archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.2.3c: c) critical or sensitive information (e.g. transactional information such as foreign exchange deals, sales orders and financial payments and credits, or standing (or static) data such as customer master files, manufacturing data, pricing tables or foreign exchange rates)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
